attributes.action: Stop taking my student loans as a wage! I have to pay those back!
attributes.background: So I'm a mum of one! I am trying to better our lives and study at university however, I am left worst off unable to afford books for my course as my student loans are taken as a wage. Now I wouldn't mind if it was grants as they are less and I don't have to pay them back but its the loans.

rejection.details: We're not sure what action you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take. If you'd like the Government to change the way that student loans are counted for calculating entitlement to government support, you could start a petition about that.
